name: Lost in Translation (rowanviola)
description:
Simply click through to generate a unique "translation mosaic." You'll be taken, line by line, through this sonnet; when you click on each line, you'll see one randomly selected version of its translation into English. You can always go back to see a different version. Try reading aloud and piecing the different versions together as you go! 

(Original by Sor Juana Ines de la Cruz; English translations by Willis Barnstone, Samuel Beckett, and Margaret Sayers Peden)
